ComicInfo.Title: Dream of the Ghost part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
Meet Loo, a teenage girl who has crash landed on a calborium mining satellite. Through entries in her journal we learn a bit of her back story as she prowls the abandoned station, searching for parts to build a robot, and generally trying to keep herself busy. With her companion robots Boris and Deiter and a little help from a digital "ghost" named Pascal, Loo strives to find a way off the satellite and to build a mechanical body to house the digitized personality of her sister that died in the crash. The only problem is, the artificial intelligence that runs the station has to follow established protocols, and to its mind, Loo has been stealing parts.
This issue also contains a 5 page backup story: Lost In The Leaves by Sizer and Paulik.
